event.title: was founded as a Roman colony in 138 BC

data.event: Valencia was founded as a Roman colony in 138 BC.

event.title: declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996

data.event: Major monuments include Valencia Cathedral, the Torres de Serrans, the Torres de Quart, the Llotja de la Seda (declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in 1996), and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències (City of Arts and Sciences), an entertainment-based cultural and architectural complex designed by Santiago Calatrava and Félix Candela.
